author: cnbc.com
title: Willdan: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
ANAHEIM, Calif. (AP) _ Willdan Group Inc. (WLDN) on Thursday reported first-quarter profit of $2.2 million.
The Anaheim, California-based company said it had net income of 24 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for stock option expense, came to 37 cents per share.
The energy efficiency and sustainability consultant posted revenue of $54.6 million in the period.
Willdan expects full-year earnings in the range of $1.95 to $2.05 per share.
Willdan shares have increased 21 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $28.86, a climb of 1 percent in the last 12 months.
